name: Dicey TD Updated
description:
a dicey tower defense game where enemies roll to get modifiers

you roll a dice to upgrade your towers

mix towers and weapons to make stronger and unique towers

unlock and upgrade as you go further

this is the updated version on my jam game, i just fixed a bug that made map 2 and 3 unlossable, and added a tutorial

space to deselect towers/weapons

f for fullscreen

q to quit

m to mute

made for mizjam game jam by luke speicher
